item.title: Magic Timers?
item.dc:creator: @vato vato
item.description:
@vato wrote:

first off…im using a czar base.

anyways
well my server has full ancients, but one problem.
i have to wait in between each barrage/blitz around 5-7 seconds, but only against other players.

also i followed this tut to get autocast, but it doesnt work,…

[quote=“0wned_Pl0x”]Declare a void like this

public void autoCastBarrage() { hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(20); inCombat(); actionTimer = 30; setAnimation(369); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; stillgfx(368, absY, absX); }

Now look for

public int GetWepAnim()

Add this in there

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675) // ancient staff { autoCastBarrage(); return 1979; }[/quote]

any idea how to make it work on a czar?

Read full topic
